name: Ludum Bear
description:
Ludum Bear is the Ludum Dare game where you're a Were Bear! Made in 48 hours.

WASD or Arrows to Move.

Spacebar to Attack

Hold Spacebar and a Direction for about a second to transform into a Bear! This requires you to have resources of that bears element.

Kill Ghouls!

Please Rate Ludum Bear on Ludum Dare! http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-35/?action=preview&uid=56574
